raw:
{{Infobox weapon poe2
| name              = Lover's Embrace
| icon              = poe2 dagger_01_icon.png
| description       = Juliena do Ancenze adored her lover Bruno, who was as clever as he was duplicitous. As Bruno's mounting debts grew beyond his ability to talk his way around them, his lenders came to believe he would better serve as an example to other potential debtors.

Bruno was murdered in his bed. As a warning, his killers left the weapon that did the deed behind - this weapon. Armed only with the dripping blade and her broken heart, Juliena would go on to hunt down the killers and avenge her lover. Juliena's profitable new life as a bounty hunter became the stuff of legends.
| added_in          = poe2
| equipment_slot    = Weapon
| weapon_type       = Dagger
| requirements      =

| is_unique         = yes
